name: Bude
firstLine: Love your brand's commitment to debunk the myth that eating healthfully is boring - It should be easy and fun to eat healthily!

name: Jennifer
firstLine: Love that you will donate a can of zero sugar drinks to the local Food Bank - you guys are awesome!

name: Katie
firstLine: Your toffee looks tasty - definitely want to give the TGT a try!

name: Hugo
firstLine: Super impressive you've been featured in top publications such as SGQ and Vogue. Your collections of sunglasses are enormous, and the designs are brilliant!

name: Alex
firstLine: Super impressive you guys are the first U.S. chocolate maker to establish a third-party certified DTCC program. Love your support for the rights of workers and the environment!

name: Diana
firstLine: You're the most skilled marketer I've ever seen. I'm sure you're inspired to work at Teakhaus!

name: Laura
firstLine: It's awesome to see that you chose your true passion of cooking, travelling, health & wellness., start your entrepreneurial journey w/ Tealish - very inspirational!

name: Kieran
firstLine: Great job with Bodybuilding Warehouse! - over 150,000 registered customers is pretty impressive!

name: Dave
firstLine: Love the DNA 'GOLF' COLLECTION - the designs are beautiful, they are like pieces of art!

name: Michael
firstLine: Its amazing to see that you are helping other women's health with Tempdrop - you are truly inspirational!
